backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing user profiles, stats, and in‑progress runs with access‑controlled query and update methods for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all major frontend files, their roles, and key implementation details.
frontend/docs/IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md: High‑level guide describing the Space Shooter project structure and implementation overview.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining OKLCH color variables, theming for light/dark modes, and global style rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx into the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing menu/game state, loading stats, handling resume data, and coordinating game lifecycle.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that logs errors and displays a recovery UI with a reload button.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states, error handling, and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/RotateDeviceOver: Non‑blocking rotate‑device hint overlay shown conditionally with styled messaging.
frontend/src/game/controls/Joystick.tsx: Implements a touch joystick that tracks pointer movement, applies a distance limit, and emits normalized x/y input.
frontend/src/game/controls/ShootButton.t: Implements a touch shoot button using pointer events, tracking press state and emitting shooting on/off.
frontend/src/game/controls/useCombinedCo: Merges keyboard, joystick, and touch shooting into a single control output using magnitude comparison and deadzone logic.
frontend/src/game/controls/useKeyboardCo: Tracks WASD/arrow/space keys and outputs movement and shooting state.
frontend/src/game/persistence/inProgress: Handles saving, loading, and clearing in-progress run data in localStorage with versioning.
frontend/src/game/persistence/useInProgr: Provides hooks to check, load, save, and clear in-progress runs using localStorage and optional backend syncing.
frontend/src/game/persistence/useSavedSt: Loads and saves player stats through the backend with react-query, falling back gracefully on errors.
Renders a stylized vector player ship with gradients, glow, and engine effects on a canvas.
frontend/src/game/render/GameCanvas.tsx: Renders the game state on a high-DPI-aware canvas, drawing borders, player ship, bullets, and other entities.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for game entities, state, controls, and gameplay enums.
frontend/src/game/ui/Hud.tsx: React HUD component displaying score, timer, level, phase info, and pause dialog.
frontend/src/game/ui/TouchControlsDebugO: Displays detailed debug info about touch control visibility, metrics, and device detection.
Shows temporary on-screen hints guiding players on touch controls layout.
frontend/src/game/ui/useTouchControlsDom: Hook that measures touch control DOM elements and logs warnings when invisible or off-screen.
frontend/src/game/useGameEngine.ts: Main game engine hook managing state, spawning, timers, player actions, collisions, and level logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDynamicViewport.ts: Tracks visualViewport changes and updates a CSS variable for stable mobile viewport height.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsTouchCapable.ts: Detects device touch capability using several signals and updates state on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useLandscapeOrientati: Tracks mobile orientation and exposes helpers to lock or unlock landscape mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module reserved for future game-specific query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme variables, dynamic viewport handling, and UI styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/GameScreen.tsx: Renders the full game view, wiring controls, orientation handling, viewport updates, and game engine state.
frontend/src/screens/MenuScreen.tsx: Renders the animated main menu with high score display and navigation actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color variables, animations, shadows, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current rebuild requirements, issues, and feature requests for restoring the Space Shooter game and always-visible controls.
